snippet: Starting next year, the prize, which had been issued every two years to a living author for an entire body of work, will be awarded annually to a single novel translated into English and published in Britain.
abstract: Starting next year, the prize, which had been issued every two years to a living author for an entire body of work, will be awarded annually to a single novel translated into English and published in Britain.

headline.main: Man Booker International Prize Changes Its Focus
headline.print_headline: Booker International  To Adopt New Approach
